mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Suggestions concerning the upcoming visit of the Marquis de Lafayette; Jefferson wrote President James Monroe that the government ought to award Lafayette land instead of a monetary pension.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lafayette, Marie Joseph Paul Yves Roch Gilbert Du Motier, marquis de, 1757-1834
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1824 May 17, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia] to [William Short], n.p.
